text: All you Fixer Upper fans out there have probably all been wondering : What will Chip and Joanna Gaines do next? The answer is drop a new collection for their line at Target, Hearth & Hand with Magnolia. The newest release is their holiday collection, which includes a ton of stylish, farmhouse - inspired decorations and gifts. You'll find wreaths and ornaments aplenty, as well as some especially fun items, like a mailbox for letters to Santa and a farmhouse style play kitchen that rivals the real thing. Already obsessed? Don't worry â€” you don't have to wait to shop.
